ygData.subject: KOS by the Freeport guards... help!
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve got a frequent grouping partner who has a problem with his faction information.  I was hoping some of the geniuses on this list might be able to help. He
ygData.messageBody:
I've got a frequent grouping partner who has a problem with his
faction information. I was hoping some of the geniuses on this list might
be able to help.
He was in the Freeport bank while another player was beating up on
one of the guards there (the corrupt one, I believe). Being the cleric
that he is, he healed him up and then left. Apparently - for whatever
reason - this other player was not able to kill the guard (what happened to
him is unknown). How do I know this? Well, the next time my friend
stopped by the bank, this guard attacked him on sight and my friend was
forced to kill him in self-defense.
As a result of this, he is now KOS by the Freeport guards and
cannot get anywhere near the gates without being jumped. We've tried any
number of things to try to raise his faction with the guards, but nothing
seems to work... Slaughtered orcs of various flavors (including those in
High Hold and Qeynos), tried a bunch of quests, etc. So far nothing has
worked... We don't believe that it's a matter of simply 'killing enough of
them' as we've taken note of the faction hits and bonuses accrued as a
result of killing these things, and it seems as if none of them affect the
'normal' Freeport Guards.
Is there anybody here who might have any suggestions?

--
Aaron Braunstein
Pacific Data Management, Inc.

<aaron_braunstein@...>
